坚持 DASH 饮食对血压有何影响？科学家们研究了控制高血压饮食方法 (DASH) 的坚持程度是否会影响血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/How-does-adherence-to-the-DASH-diet-influence-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/How-does-adherence-to-the-DASH-diet-influence-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83d21dc9-3cc4-4d13-ad2d-957d28b338ff Wed, 09 Aug 2023 09:45:00 -0400 How does adherence to the DASH diet influence blood pressure?
审查检查帕金森病患者的视觉障碍在《脑科学》最近发表的一篇综述中，研究人员回顾了帕金森病 (PD) 患者视力障碍的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Review-examines-visual-disturbances-among-Parkinsone28099s-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Review-examines-visual-disturbances-among-Parkinsone28099s-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd6d2f5c-521b-41f7-854c-a62d8d388d99 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 09:28:00 -0400 Review examines visual disturbances among Parkinson’s disease patients

开创性研究将军人睾丸癌与“永远的化学物质”联系起来加里·弗洛克 (Gary Flook) 在空军服役了 37 年，曾在现已关闭的伊利诺伊州查努特空军基地和印第安纳州前格里森空军基地担任消防员，在那里他定期进行水成膜泡沫（AFFF）训练。白色阻燃剂非常有效，但现在已知有毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Pioneering-study-links-testular-cancer-among-military-personnel-to-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Pioneering-study-links-testular-cancer-among-military-personnel-to-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=964621c8-2d99-44c1-a6de-b576fa8084f3 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 07:17:00 -0400 Pioneering study links testicular cancer among military personnel to ‘forever chemicals’
